text: aur jab unake paas ek kitaab allaah kee or se aaee hai jo usakee pushti karatee hai jo unake paas maujood hai - aur isase pahale to ve na maananevaale logon par vijay paane ke ichchhuk rahe hai - phir jab vah cheez unake paas aa gaee jise ve pahachaan bhee gae hain, to usaka inakaar kar baithe; to allaah kee phitakaar inakaar karane vaalon par
